t: 15:3*r The Hebrew term refers to the irrevocable giving over of things or persons to the Lord, often by totally destroying them; also in verses 8, 9, 15, 18, 20 and 21.
15:9*r Or the*i grown*i bulls*i ; the meaning of the Hebrew for this phrase is uncertain.
15:32*r The meaning of the Hebrew for this phrase is uncertain.
